item.title: Google Reports 75 Zero-Days Exploited in 2024 — 44% Targeted Enterprise Security Products
item.description:
Google has revealed that it observed 75 zero-day vulnerabilities exploited in the wild in 2024, down from 98 in 2023 but an increase from 63 the year before.
Of the 75 zero-days, 44% of them targeted enterprise products. As many as 20 flaws were identified in security software and appliances.

item.title: Indian Court Orders Action to Block Proton Mail Over AI Deepfake Abuse Allegations
item.description:

The High Court of Karnataka, on April 29, said the ruling was in response to a legal complaint filed by M Moser Design Associated India Pvt Ltd in January 2025.
